alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued December 12 at 10:32AM MST until December 12 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in freezing fog. Minor ice accumulation possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range Foothills and Central Laramie County including Cheyenne. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Periods of freezing drizzle combined with very low visibility and freezing fog, will result in hazardous travel conditions this morning across southeast Wyoming. Please use extra caution over the Interstate 80 Summit and bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for ice on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
